1110001000101010 1001101111101001 1 -> sum: 0111111000010100, cout: 1
0011001011000111 0010000011101001 1 -> sum: 0101001110110001, cout: 0
0101111111101110 1110000110110110 1 -> sum: 0100000110100101, cout: 1

0000001101000100 0111100100011110 0 -> sum: 0111110001100010, cout: 0
0111100001000000 1010110101000110 1 -> sum: 0010010110000111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
